title: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Incorrect source path in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. See tests/new/binaryWarnings/ for code to reproduce the issue. These tests may give false positives due to filename checking not being enabled in harness verification of messages. In AJDT, the filename may be omitted if it makes no sense to AJDT.
OB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'. In some cases, the filenames do not appear at all.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Run declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars. 
2. Observe that the source path is listed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main'.
